reviews.text: We went on a great English language tour that covered the building as well as some basic Swiss history, culture and government. The building itself is very beautiful, with lots of stained glass and murals. There's also an outdoor terrace with places to sit and a great view over the city and out to the Alps. There's free, you have to book ahead on line. English on Saturday at 2.

A very beautiful building which has a height of 96 meter, same as the St Stephen Church, two tallest buildings at the Pest side, there is a law in Hungary that no building in Pest can be higher than 96 meter because no one can be above God and government. A very interesting fact about Budapest. 
The Parliament building is stunning during both day time and night time, but at night, when the lights are on, it is very beautiful. 
You can pay a small fee to visit the inside of the Parliament building, the free tour tour guide said it is worth it.
It's a Government building which is open to public. Anyone can access the place freely. It has got the world class security and that's the reason they allow public here..
Beautiful parliament building, open to public. You can have a stunning view of the city from the back side of the building.
Nice place.  The water fountain is good in front of the building. Lot of children will play in this water fountain

The museum has a small, but outstanding collection of art. Everything is wonderfully framed, oh yeah!

The best thing tho is the insanely good cherry pie and a delicious espresso at the museum coffee shop upstairs.
Regularly come here for excellent exhibitions, and this time for a wonderful show about Hodler. Great experience and great staff!
Beautiful museum and collection!  Very quite and inviting.  Thank you

I attended the exhibition of artwork by Ferdinand Hodler. 

I was pleased to note that unlike other art institutions, photography was allowed albeit without flash. 

The paintings were well-represented although the labels to describe them are quite small which meant that my colleague who is visually impaired had a hard time reading them. 

Also the granite stairs leading up to the first floor and the second floor have no visual indication on them which meant that my colleague found it hard to see where the next step was. 

A simple black reflective tape or some other high-contrast colour would combat this problem.
Early collections of great artists present. A different side of Picasso, for example, with paintings not related to cubism.

A very nice zoo where animals have plenty of space to move and kids can safely roam around. There's a "free" part with goats 🐐, boars 🐗, flamingos and lamas 🦙 (among others). The "paying" area is divided in two sections; indoor (snakes 🐍, iguanas 🦎, fish 🐠, monkeys 🐒, alligators 🐊 ..) and outdoors (seals , bisons 🐃, deer, 🐻 bears, 🐺 wolfs, 🦉 owls)..

The Bern park was beautiful. They have more space for their animals. There is a Kinder zoo. They have a limited food selection. Then they have a main zoo, and a trail to walk down. Student prices are great. It's not expensive to go. There is also the 19 bus that can take you pretty much there. They have a lot of space for their animals. It was nice to take a breath of fresh air. See some big nice animals. Nothing completely exotics. But some animals were hibernating for the winter. Come here if you want to be one with nature.
The best Zoo I've ever visited. It's really a pleasure to see conditions animals are living in.
Nice place for big and small to see and walk along. A cosy zoo in a natural environment. Only the vivarium takes entrance fee.
Animal park is clean and seems Perfect for a few hours with kids. Unfortunately a lot of box were empty. A bit disappointed.
You can't miss this spot since it's central and big attraction of the city. Walk by and capture the time of the famous clock.
Very beautiful attraction - definitely jumps in "must visit".
One of the best cities in Switzerland located in the German part of the country. it's super authentic with great sight seeing

Fantastic Clocktower from 1560 with Sun, Moon and star sign clockwork. Every 4 Minutes before a full hour becomes complete you can watch a figure game at the easter side. A must for every Berne visitor.

If you decide to walk from the train station it won't take you longer than 10 minutes to reach it.  On the hour you can also experience how its mechanism works.  You also have the option to go on tours if you have some time and want to know more about this landmark which in my opinion should top your list during your visit to Switzerland's capital!

This restaurant is right definition of heaven. The food is delicious I ordered the steak with vegetables, herbal butter and wine sauce.
The steak was medium and juice just like I love it, the vegetables were flavorful and the butter on top was just perfect.
On the side I've got some yummy yummy crunchy french fries.
Now that was the food, the view outside this place is breathtaking, it was freezing outside but I couldn't help standing there to take it all in.
Service: great, the waitress was super nice and patient.

Good place with nice view of the city, you can sit at the restaurant or on the grass, whatever you prefer! Great place to bring your kids, because there is a playground just next to the restaurant. Nice service and staff 👌

The best view of Bern and an amazing atmosphere with a wood fire place on the inside and an outside covered area. Good service with an adequate range of spirits and wines. The waitress who served us was very nice. Hence I would say good service.
Beautiful, warm and comfortable tables, indoors and partially outdoors. Food is tremendous. The lamb steak must try.

Fantastic panorama spot, wide view over Bern, 5 minutes walk from Bus parking and tourist information. Start your Bern visit here at this sunshine spot with a cup of coffee & regional cakes. People of Berne love it as well, often busy. Outdoor Playground directly beside it.
Very nice food and the restaurant is very famous amongst researchers. The service is really good and the price is not high nor low for a Swiss class dinner. The staff is very friendly and open.
Wonderful Service and steak tartare!
Very nice food
Really bad
Nice service and cheap(ish) beer. Perfect

Not cheap! But value for money.
Excellent Swiss Food with knowledgeable and friendly service right next to the Parliament Buildings in Bern.
Also has a good selection of quality wines by the glass. Sit outside if the weather permits, to enjoy the passing selection of interesting pedestrians. Go inside for an intimate Dinner with your Loved One.
It‘s Entrecôte Fédérale, what more to say? You were in Bern and never went there? There‘s your next stop! Check it out but make sure to make a reservation.
Very good food And great service. Highly recommended

Right in front of the Bundesrat. Sometimes you get to meet some of our politicians, be it Federal Council or other members of the parliament. No fuss, great meat and perfect service. Tourists, locals and swiss "elite" all share the same table. 

The big salad bowls are also fun and benefit to the cosy atmosphere.
Horrible customer service. Left me waiting for my main course more than 1 hour and had completely forgotten. And then didn’t compensate me in any way.

For me the Kornhauskeller is one of the best restaurants in town. It's not the cheapest place for sure, but the food is very delicious and the atmosphere down in this amazing building is also very impressive! All together is absolutely worth a visit for everyone who likes great food and atmosphere and ready to pay the little extra for it.

Food good, great wine, but beware that you do pay a premium for the amazing location. Service was not up to standard of the prices, but very friendly. All in all, worth a visit just to dine in the amazing atmosphere of the high ceiling cellar.
Stopped here for drinks. It was tasty and the place had a really cool vibe. If I was in Bern I'd stop back here to take a chance at dinner. Really cool place.

Well worth a stop at the Gallery Bar for a drink, even if just for a beer, but recommend getting a cocktail. Google said it was closed on Monday, but it was open on the night that I went. You will go down a flight of stairs to get to the bar and then it is a second flight down to the restaurant.

A fantastically elegant location in the historic Kornhauskelker (grain storage cellar) situated on the heart of Bern. 
The place reeks of class and elegance. The staff are attentive but not obtrusive. Dimly lit but not too dim that you can't admire the wonderful murals adorning the walls and ceiling.
A great place for a special occasion.

Very nice restaurant. Serves traditional swiss food along with some classic dishes.
The quality is really nice and the prices are normal for swiss standarts.
Also a great place for people with celiac disease.
We ate here for a Conference, and the food was great! I would deffinately recommended it
Friendly place, good food, excellent service.

I live in Bern and I must say that this restaurant is my favorit. The menu is typical swiss, they have fantastic wine, beer is fresh like nowhere else, food quality is second to none. Service is very friendly and professionnal. The deco reminds of a forge (Schmied in german) lots of metal but the ambiance still warm thanks to the wooden and leather furniture. This restaurant has been there for a very long time, is traditionnal and has to be put on the top list of restaurants in Bern, give it a try, start with a « Stange » (draft beer). Their tartar is one of the best I know In Europe.

Lovely place, great service, really nice people. Swiss bread is great and, of course, Swiss people like their cheese as well so it ticks all my boxes. It's expensive if you are travelling on our poor beat up GBP but that's our fault not theirs.
World class. Staff particularly attentive to clients. You get the care deserved for your money. Food is wonderful. It's a luxurious place and also romantic.
I love to sit in the Bar on the ground floor. Quiet music, low light and a natural wood colour... 100% mine

Amazing luxury hotel in Bern with very high service standards. Always live to stay at the Bellevue Palace in Bern or having lunch or dinner in the restaurant Vue. Amazing staff. Thanks a lot to all of them.

A high-class and therefore expensive hotel located in the center of Boone next to the casino. The place oozes luxury. As expected the staff very friendly and very attentive without being too obtrusive. The hotel is as I mentioned, high class and all the facilities you'd expect in a top-class hotel offered here. The Gin Gin bar is a nice area where you can see autographs from some of the same famous people who have stayed there.
Just love the atmosphere.. The sunday brunch is amazing. Very good service and helpful staff. Would definitely go back there again.

This restaurant is right definition of heaven. The food is delicious I ordered the steak with vegetables, herbal butter and wine sauce.
The steak was medium and juice just like I love it, the vegetables were flavorful and the butter on top was just perfect.
On the side I've got some yummy yummy crunchy french fries.
Now that was the food, the view outside this place is breathtaking, it was freezing outside but I couldn't help standing there to take it all in.
Service: great, the waitress was super nice and patient.

Good place with nice view of the city, you can sit at the restaurant or on the grass, whatever you prefer! Great place to bring your kids, because there is a playground just next to the restaurant. Nice service and staff 👌

The best view of Bern and an amazing atmosphere with a wood fire place on the inside and an outside covered area. Good service with an adequate range of spirits and wines. The waitress who served us was very nice. Hence I would say good service.
Beautiful, warm and comfortable tables, indoors and partially outdoors. Food is tremendous. The lamb steak must try.

Fantastic panorama spot, wide view over Bern, 5 minutes walk from Bus parking and tourist information. Start your Bern visit here at this sunshine spot with a cup of coffee & regional cakes. People of Berne love it as well, often busy. Outdoor Playground directly beside it.
